paper.title: Bayesian Nonparametric Panel Markov-Switching GARCH Models
paper.abstract: This article proposes Bayesian nonparametric inference for panel Markov-switching GARCH models. The model incorporates series-specific hidden Markov chain processes that drive the GARCH parameters. To cope with the high-dimensionality of the parameter space, the article assumes soft parameter pooling through a hierarchical prior distribution and introduces cross sectional clustering through a Bayesian nonparametric prior distribution. An MCMC posterior approximation algorithm is developed and its efficiency is studied in simulations under alternative settings. An empirical application to financial returns data in the United States is offered with a portfolio performance exercise based on forecasts. A comparison shows that the Bayesian nonparametric panel Markov-switching GARCH model provides good forecasting performances and economic gains in optimal asset allocation.

domain_result.justification: 该论文的核心技术是Bayesian非参数面板Markov-switching GARCH模型，其应用场景包括金融收益数据的预测和基于预测的投资组合绩效练习。论文明确提到该模型在最优资产配置中提供了良好的预测性能和经济收益，这直接关联到投资组合管理领域。
